caseStudyDescription.caseStudyDescription: Generative research and design to develop design principles for a nascent online retail category

caseStudyContent.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"With beer eCommerce still emergent, MillerCoors wanted to understand the future of the category online.
